verses.name: Matthew 26:70
verses.text: But he denied before them all, saying, I know not what thou sayest.

verses.name: Matthew 26:71
verses.text: And when he was gone out into the porch, another maid saw him, and said unto them that were there, This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth.

verses.name: Matthew 26:72
verses.text: And again he denied with an oath, I do not know the man.

verses.name: Matthew 26:73
verses.text: And after a while came unto him they that stood by, and said to Peter, Surely thou also art one of them; for thy speech bewrayeth thee.

verses.name: Matthew 26:74
verses.text: Then began he to curse and to swear, saying, I know not the man. And immediately the cock crew.
